Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Slow service but tasty large dishes! Fun people watching location, don't go if you're in a hurry though. The coffee was fantastic, best I've had in months.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic food.  Service was quick,  prices reasonable for such fresh and tasty ingredients. Would def recommend you try this place. Indoor and outdoor seating,  right on the canal. Great relaxing spot for lunch

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text:
This is a must try if you are visiting Amsterdam! Beautiful breakfast/lunch place with an amazing view next to the river üòç
The staff is really friendly and polite and the food is OMG!! Delicious!!!
I would give more stars if I could. üòÅ

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Real good place! Good food beautifully presented with impeccable service (smiling, relaxing) for really good price and in the heart of the city! Cherry on top: incredible cinnamon rolls spotted while paying, still thinking about it!

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text:
I genually cannot remember what the name of those dishes were.... but I will definetly ask the waiters what that was. Because they were delicious! üòçüòç
Btw: really good service and location. We felt so welcome
Highly recommended

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text:
Like a small secret in Amsterdam center. Tasteful breakfasts and brunch.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text:
Best place in town for lunch and coffee! Nice staff and great foodüëå
Just had lunch again overthere and it is amazing how the chef and owner comes up with new healthy and tasty recepies. Just learned they have a place a few doors away for exclusive fine dining. I am in!!üòã

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: One word... amazing! Service was really good, prices are what you expect for the food! And tasted unbelievable!

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: I strongly recommend the Roasted Chicken Sandwich üëå best one ever! The atmosphere is welcoming although the place is rather small. If you are catching up with a friend this place in the heart of Amsterdam is perfect.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Awesome place right on the canal, great salads and most importantly friendly staff!

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Fantastic place to stop for a delicious and healthy breakfast. We ordered a Frittata (it seemed to be the special of the day) and it was just delicious. Name: Ivy & Bros

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Good coffee and awesome place.

Name: Ivy & Bros

Review Text:
Wow, great breakfast toastie !! Nice and healthy food but do order the deluxe toastie. The coffee was nice too!

Name: Ivy & Bros

Review Text: Came here last week. Service was very friendly. Food was good but for some reason the chef couldnt or wouldn't poach an egg so my wife had to have it another way.  Grilled cheese was nice

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Lovely little place for a quick brunch or coffee by the canal. The staff is friendly and accommodating. Not a long menu, but chicken open sandwich I had was delicious, although a bit too rich for my taste..

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Good, heavy breakfast. Great for starting your day in Amsterdam. Good cappuccino as well. Friendly staff. Recommended

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: The biggest gluten-free eggs on toast I ever had! Great gf and vegan selection, accomodating staff, and great decor!

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: I had one of the healthiest breakfasts I've experienced ever in Amsterdam at Ivy and Bros. All of the ingredients looked so fresh and the presentation of the meals was beautiful. I actually visited twice as I was so satisfied with the first ‚Ä¶

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Their Avocado, bacon and cheese was a bit boring. My Vegan companions salads was better though ‚Ä¶

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Felt like we stepped into an oasis in rainy Amsterdam. Tastefully decorated cafe with greenery, very cozy interior. Food was great, and service even better! Great value for money. Highly recommended!

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Service was great,  smiles all round.  The food was delicious.  A nice healthy meal with lots of greens. The inside of the shop was decorated with interesting art including a giant skeleton shark mouth.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: This was a highlight for me since I'm pescatarian and dairy free - lots of choice! ‚Ä¶

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Amazing lunch here. We asked for the veggie salad which was great both in quality and quantity, and the salmon sandwich (here sandwiches don't have bread on top, that's weird, but anyway). It had a lot of salmon. If you want tea to drink be ‚Ä¶

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Great food, coffee & views ! Perfect for a sunny morning in Amsterdam to start with a fresh & healthy breakfast. Great options for vegetarians and vegans as well. One of the those upcoming stand alones which you find across major cities - ‚Ä¶

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Delicious! I find the central very difficult to find a place to sit quietly and enjoy brunch at a reasonable price, but Ivy and Bros satisfied me fully. ‚Ä¶

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Lovely little cafe down by the canal. Menu was a little limited but the food was fresh and well presented. Was full when we arrived so had a little wait for tables to be available. I went for avacado, bacon and cheese open sandwich and a nice tea. Delicious, and I could have eaten it twice over. Highly recommended.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Ivy & Bros is a very nice place to enjoy coffee, tea, and other drinks. Both waitresses are really friendly and they always have a smile for you. :) The cozy atmosphere invites to relax.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Delicious smoked salmon salad, nice vibes, friendly staff. Also thoroughly enjoyed the selection of fresh desserts at the counter, particularly the cheesecake. Not super busy. Great place to catch up with friends.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: The food and coffee here are amazing! They have gluten free options as well if you have celiac. Highly recommend the roasted chicken salad.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Nice and particular place with vegan and vegetarian options, for a quick but tasty lunch. Prices are on Amsterdam's average  The waiters were super nice.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Lovely place, great food and really polite staff. Had a really great time there üòä

Review Text: SUCH GOOD FOOD. little over priced but honestly so worth it! Staff were lovely aswell.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text:

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Quirky caf√© with funky decor. Friendly and welcoming staff add to the pleasant atmosphere. Food and drink were good. Ceramics and glassware are available to purchase. Would definitely return.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Found this lovely place walking around the city center ! In a quite neighbourhood with a lovely spot along the canal ! The food was amazing and affordable ! Looking forward to coming back !

Review Text: Had an amazing smoked chicken sandwich sitting outside by the canal. It was so good, I did not want to eat again afterwards as I was still savouring it. Staff were very friendly.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: I had smoked salmon sandwich and it was great! Ingredients were very fresh and smoked salmon was delicious. I loved the decor of the restaurant but having food by the canal was great alternative:)

Review Text:
Great food and nice friendly staff.

Review Text: I was lunching here with a friend of mine. And it was absolutely the most delicious lunch I had in my entire life! It was also vegetarian which I liked a lot :)

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Perfect location with a delicious breakfast !

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text:
Great food

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: The restaurant is named after the owner dogs, how cute is that. Great place for lunch or a snack the dutch apple pie is to die for. Unfortunately it was finished before i could take a pic

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: very nice place, always great food and friendly people. love coming here

Review Text: good place for a fast lunch. Staff is kind and friendly.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text: Good food, central location, really nice to have brunch here. A person who is a fan of flat white told that it was not bad at all.

Name: Ivy & Bros

The cake was not too sweet but just right, with interesting texture from the bits of stroopwaffle inside. The cafe also has a chill and calming ambiance. I'd definitely come back again.

Name: Ivy & Bros
Review Text:
Tasty food, good service.

Name: Ivy & Bros

Name: Ivy & Bros
